title: Assassin’s Creed Valhalla?! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 04.29.20
description:
Gary Whitta and Greg talk about the live Assassin’s Creed reveal, Reggie’s new podcast, and Gary’s Animal Crossing talkshow! 

Time Stamps - 
 00:08:00 - Housekeeping
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mohammed Mohammed, Al Tribesman, Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:10:04 - New Assassin’s Creed Setting is being Revealed RIGHT NOW, Joe @ IGN
00:17:19 - What have been the wildest or most interesting ways games have been revealed that you can remember? - Best Friends Q:The Nano Biologist
00:23:00 - Review Round-up: Streets of Rage 4
00:29:20 - Party Royale coming to Fortnite? Steven T. Wright @ GameSpot
00:36:00 - Reggie Starts a Podcast! Gene Park at Launcher
00:41:00 - Out today
 Reader mail   -
00:50:20 - Give Stadia another shot - Jacob Porter
00:55:31 - Do you think it is possible we could see a battlefront 3 before EAs star wars license deal runs out in 2023?
Also - what do you think will happen with star wars games in the future? - Amiad Fredman (ah-mee-odd)
00:59:50 - Squad Up:Jacob Porter(STADIA) - TooTallPorter
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg and Blessing
